name: Lipton Yellow Label Tea Bags, 50 pcs
description: Taste the sunshine…in every rich cup of Lipton Yellow Label tea. The world’s full of wonder with the awakening taste of Lipton Yellow Label tea. Made with the top, sun-ripened tea leaves, freshly picked for their brightening, rich and aromatic flavour. A sunny sip to awaken you to the wonders the world has to offer. Lipton Yellow Label. Live Awake.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
